ref: 5700 taraṇa n. ʻ crossing ʼ (in nadī -- t˚ n. KātyŚr., su -- táraṇa- RV.), m. ʻ raft, boat ʼ lex., taraṇī -- f. ʻ boat ʼ Hariv. &rcirclemacr Pa. taraṇa -- n. ʻ passing over ʼ; Pk. taraṇa -- n. ʻ crossing, swimming ʼ; H. (poet.) taran m. ʻ crossing a river ʼ; G. taraṇ n. ʻ floating, swimming ʼ. -- Pk. taraṇa -- n., ˚ṇi -- m. ʻ boat ʼ; H. tarnī f. ʻ boat (poet.), little stool on which a plate of sweetmeats is set ʼ; G. taraṇ n., tarṇī f. ʻ boat ʼ.
